Title: Co-Founder & CMO
Key_Insight_1: 3-tier platform model: Tier 1 (click-receive service) / Tier 2 (QMS software) / Tier 3 (licensed full platform)
Key_Insight_2: Approval CASCADE eliminates 50% sales friction: once part certified at one operator, all future orgs reuse approval instantly
Key_Insight_3: Multi-stage approval pipeline is product (not print): idea → feasibility → prototype → certification → finance → inventory
Key_Insight_4: IP strategy: own AddManuChain's designs; OEMs become licensed distributors not competitors
Key_Insight_5: Sub-threshold procurement entry: identify dept with budget authority <$50K; deliver disproportionate ROI on pilot
Supported_Hypotheses: 3-tier model enables enterprise scaling; Approval cascade = network effect flywheel; Parts library becomes key asset
Challenged_Hypotheses: None - highly validating mirror company; 100% aligned business model
Strategic_Value: EXTREMELY HIGH - Direct peer/competitor discovery; proven business model; explicit partnership offer
Follow_Up: Follow-up after Engine Summit Toronto (April 1); Propose Polyunity QMS white-label license for O&G vertical; Steven said 'We can't afford to compete...need to raise all ships'
